answers.answer: Wow that same day? I'm 37+3 weeks and I have gestational diabetes. My doctor wants to deliver 1-2 weeks early but it all depends on my sonogram and how much amnioticFluid my baby has. I go in to check next Tuesday and I'm hoping that big they do induce that they'll at least give me a day... Not so sudden. Good luck and I hope all goes well!

question: 38 Weeks the doctor says my fluid is 2 low i go in for a sonogram monday if they get they same results i'll be induced that day , never heard of that happening before but as long as my nunu's ok thats all that matters excited and scared at the same time, has anyone experience this before?
title: low fluid?
